content: keams keams is the perfect last minute go- yarn madelinetosh chunky to gift for every boy or girl needle 9 us 5 50 mm or what you need to get gauge this is knit top down with buttons gauge 16 0 stitches = 4 inches half way down the front yardage 225 250 300 350 400 450 500 the adorable handmade buttons can sizes newborn 3 months 6 months 9-12 months 12-24 months 2-3 years 4-6 years be found in the etsy shop katrinkles chest measurements 15 ½ 18 18 ½ 20 22 ½ 24 25 ½ page 1 notions 3 or 4 buttons 1 size ws - wrong side yo - yarn over sm- slip marker pm - place marker ssk slip slip knit together rs - right side k2tog- knit two stitches together rm remove marker kfb - knit into the front and back of the stitch cast on 40 45 50 51 56 57 60 stitches using a long tail cast on row 1 ws knit to the end row 2 rs knit to the end row 3 ws knit to the end row 4 rs buttonhole row knit 2 yo k2tog knit to the end and the same time increase 4 stitches using a kfb evenly spaced 44 49 54 55 60 61 64 stitches row 5 ws knit 9 10 11 11 12 12 13 front pm knit 6 6 7 7 8 8 8 sleeve pm knit 14 17 18 19 20 21 22 back pm knit 6 6 7 7 8 8 8 sleeve pm knit 9 10 11 11 12 12 13 front row 6 rs knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb work 4 times knit to the end 8 stitches increased row 7 ws knit 4 purl to the last 4 stitches knit 4 work row 6 and 7 3 times total row 8 rs buttonhole row knit 2 yo k2tog knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb work 4 times knit to the end 8 stitches increased row 9 ws knit 4 purl to the last 4 stitches knit 4 work row 6 and 7 3 times total work row 8 and 9 buttonhole row 1 time total for size newborn work row 6 and 7 1 more time for size 3 months 6 months and 9-12 months work row 6 and 7 2 more times for size 12-24 months work row 6 and 7 3 more times work row 8 and 9 buttonhole row for size 2-3 years work row 6 and 7 3 more times work row 8 and 9 buttonhole row for size 4-6 years work row 6 and 7 3 more times work row 8 and 9 buttonhole row you will have 9 10 10 10 12 12 12 raglan increases 116 129 134 135 156 157 160 stitches joining in the round the right side is facing you it is time to join in the round
